t: How do Stores work with other Amazon Ads products?
Amazon Transparency: Counterfeit and brand protection
s: If you meet all eligibility requirements, enroll your brand in the Transparency program. Use the same credentials you use to log in to the Brand Registry portal. If your brand is already enrolled, log in to the Transparency portal to enroll products and add users to your account.

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Creating and maintaining a Brand Store is free, and you do not need to advertise on Amazon to create a Brand Store. Once you create a Brand Store, you can showcase your products, brand story, and lifestyle content to engage shoppers.

t: What Brands Are Gated on Amazon? A Complete Guide for Sellers
s: To join the Amazon Brand Registry, brand owners must provide proof of ownership, such as a trademark registration or a utility patent.
– Proof of product authenticity (e.g., invoice, Order ID, licensing agreement, letter of authorization). It must clearly prove that your products do not infringe any intellectual property rights.

t: Amazon Brand Protection Tools Explained. - GreyScout
s: May 15, 2024 - Amazon offers five programs with varying levels of protection for businesses selling on the platform: the Amazon Brand Registry, Transparency, Project Zero, Counterfeit Crimes Unit, and IP Accelerator. Each program provides a different set of features to help protect brands from various threats.

t: Protecting Your Brand on Amazon - Updated 2023
s: September 10, 2024 - Additionally, you should have a contract with your manufacturer, which shows that they manufacture products for your brand. If you manufacture your own products, Amazon will not accept “self-issued” invoices as proof of authenticity.

t: What Is Amazon Brand Gating? (And How to Protect Your Sales With It)
s: Amazon brand gating helps your business prevent unauthorized resellers from using your brand name to sell knock-off versions of your products. Instead, resellers must provide proof that they’re an authorized reseller, like through an invoice and written permission from your brand.
